questions.questionText: What does HTML stand for?
questions.explanation: HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language, which is used to create web pages.

questions.questionText: Which HTML tag is used to define a paragraph?
questions.explanation:
The

tag is used to define a paragraph in HTML.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the <!DOCTYPE> declaration?
questions.explanation: The <!DOCTYPE> declaration defines the version of HTML being used in the document.

questions.questionText: Which attribute specifies an image source in the tag?
questions.explanation: The src attribute specifies the path to the image file.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the <a> tag in HTML?
questions.explanation: The <a> tag is used to create hyperlinks to navigate to other pages or resources.

questions.questionText: Which HTML tag is used to display a horizontal line?
questions.explanation: The <hr> tag is used to insert a horizontal line in HTML.

questions.questionText: How do you create an ordered list in HTML?
questions.explanation: The <ol> tag is used to create an ordered (numbered) list in HTML.

questions.questionText: Which attribute is used to specify unique identifiers for elements in HTML?
questions.explanation: The id attribute provides a unique identifier for an HTML element.

questions.questionText: What is the default alignment for text in HTML?
questions.explanation: Text in HTML is left-aligned by default.

questions.questionText: Which HTML element is used for the largest heading?
questions.explanation: The <h1> tag is used for the largest heading in HTML.

questions.questionText: Which HTML attribute is used to define inline styles?
questions.explanation: The style attribute is used to apply inline CSS to an element.

questions.questionText: How can you open a link in a new tab using HTML?
questions.explanation: The target='_blank' attribute opens a link in a new tab.

questions.questionText: What does the <table> tag define in HTML?
questions.explanation: The <table> tag is used to define a table structure in HTML.

questions.questionText: Which tag is used to define a list item?
questions.explanation: The <li> tag is used to define an item in a list.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the <meta> tag in HTML?
questions.explanation: The <meta> tag is used to provide metadata about an HTML document.

questions.questionText: Which HTML element is used to embed a video?
questions.explanation: The <video> element is used to embed video content in a web page.

questions.questionText:
What does the
tag do in HTML?
questions.explanation:
The
tag is used to insert a line break in HTML content.

questions.questionText: What is the <form> element used for?
questions.explanation: The <form> element is used to collect input from users through various fields.

questions.questionText: Which tag is used to define a clickable button in HTML?
questions.explanation: The <button> tag is used to define a clickable button in HTML.

questions.questionText: What is the correct HTML tag for a line break?
questions.explanation:
The
tag is used to create a line break in HTML.
